description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国云南省德宏傣族景颇族自治州陇川县的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative organ of Longchuan County, Dehong Dai and Jingpo Autonomous Prefecture, Yunnan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任陇川县人民政府县长。
description.en: A Chinese politician currently serving as the County Magistrate of the Longchuan County People's Government.

nodes.id: 德宏傣族景颇族自治州人民政府

zh-cn: 德宏傣族景颇族自治州人民政府

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国云南省德宏傣族景颇族自治州的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative organ of Dehong Dai and Jingpo Autonomous Prefecture, Yunnan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 陇川县的国家权力机关。
description.en: The state power organ of Longchuan County.

nodes.id: 陇川县人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 陇川县人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 陇川县人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Longchuan County People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党陇川县委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党陇川县委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在陇川县的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Longchuan County.

nodes.id: 中国共产党陇川县人民政府党组

zh-cn: 中国共产党陇川县人民政府党组

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在陇川县人民政府中设立的领导机构。
description.en: The leading party group established by the Communist Party of China within the Longchuan County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国云南省的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative organ of Yunnan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国云南省德宏傣族景颇族自治州下辖的县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Dehong Dai and Jingpo Autonomous Prefecture, Yunnan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1950年中国人民解放军进入陇川后成立的临时管理机构。
description.en: A temporary administrative body established after the People's Liberation Army entered Longchuan in 1950.

description.zh-cn: 1951年在陇川成立的联合政府，是陇川县人民政府的前身之一。
description.en: A united government established in Longchuan in 1951, one of the predecessors of the Longchuan County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 土司，曾任陇川各民族联合政府行政委员会主任。
description.en: A Tusi who served as the Chairman of the Administrative Committee of the Longchuan United Government of All Nationalities.

description.zh-cn: 宗教人士，曾任陇川各民族联合政府行政委员会副主任。
description.en: A religious figure who served as the Vice Chairman of the Administrative Committee of the Longchuan United Government of All Nationalities.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国地方各级人民代表大会和地方各级人民政府组织法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国地方各级人民代表大会和地方各级人民政府组织法

description.zh-cn: 一部规范中华人民共和国地方各级人民代表大会和地方各级人民政府的组织和工作的法律。
description.en: A law that regulates the organization and work of local people's congresses and local people's governments at all levels in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 国务院关于国家行政机关和企业事业单位社会团体印章管理的规定

zh-cn: 国务院关于国家行政机关和企业事业单位社会团体印章管理的规定

description.zh-cn: 一部由国务院发布的关于印章管理的行政法规。
description.en: An administrative regulation on the management of official seals issued by the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，郑洪云是陇川县人民政府的现任县长。
description.en: According to the infobox, Zheng Hongyun is the current County Magistrate of the Longchuan County People's Government.

relationships.target: 德宏傣族景颇族自治州人民政府

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，德宏傣族景颇族自治州人民政府是陇川县人民政府的业务上级。
description.en: According to the infobox, the People's Government of Dehong Dai and Jingpo Autonomous Prefecture is the operational superior of the Longchuan County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，陇川县人民代表大会是陇川县人民政府的组织上级。
description.en: According to the infobox, the Longchuan County People's Congress is the organizational superior of the Longchuan County People's Government.

relationships.target: 陇川县人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，陇川县人民代表大会常务委员会是陇川县人民政府的组织上级。
description.en: According to the infobox, the Standing Committee of the Longchuan County People's Congress is the organizational superior of the Longchuan County People's Government.

relationships.source: 中国共产党陇川县人民政府党组
relationships.target: 中国共产党陇川县委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，中国共产党陇川县委员会是陇川县人民政府党组的中共上级。
description.en: According to the infobox, the Longchuan County Committee of the CPC is the party superior of the Party Leadership Group of the Longchuan County People's Government.

relationships.source: 中国共产党陇川县人民政府党组

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党陇川县人民政府党组是设立在陇川县人民政府内的党组织。
description.en: The Party Leadership Group of the Longchuan County People's Government is the party organization established within the Longchuan County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 根据规定，陇川县人民政府的印章由云南省人民政府制发，此为政府行使职权的凭证。
description.en: According to regulations, the official seal of the Longchuan County People's Government is manufactured and issued by the Yunnan Provincial People's Government, which serves as the credential for the government to exercise its powers.

description.zh-cn: 1950年5月，中国人民解放军攻入陇川，同年成立了陇川工作委员会。
description.en: In May 1950, the Chinese People's Liberation Army entered Longchuan and established the Longchuan Working Committee in the same year.

description.zh-cn: 在陇川工作委员会的基础上，于1951年12月21日成立了陇川各民族联合政府。
description.en: On the basis of the Longchuan Working Committee, the Longchuan United Government of All Nationalities was established on December 21, 1951.

description.zh-cn: 1951年12月21日，陇川各民族联合政府成立，土司多永安被任命为行政委员会主任。
description.en: On December 21, 1951, the Longchuan United Government of All Nationalities was established, and Tusi Duo Yongan was appointed as the Chairman of the Administrative Committee.

position.en: Vice Chairman of the Administrative Committee

description.zh-cn: 1951年12月21日，陇川各民族联合政府成立，宗教人士司拉山被任命为行政委员会副主任。
description.en: On December 21, 1951, the Longchuan United Government of All Nationalities was established, and religious figure Si Lashan was appointed as the Vice Chairman of the Administrative Committee.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国地方各级人民代表大会和地方各级人民政府组织法

description.zh-cn: 该法律规定了包括陇川县人民政府在内的县级地方政府所行使的职权。
description.en: This law stipulates the powers and functions exercised by county-level local governments, including the Longchuan County People's Government.

relationships.source: 国务院关于国家行政机关和企业事业单位社会团体印章管理的规定

description.zh-cn: 该1999年的规定明确了陇川县人民政府等国家行政机关印章的规格和制发机构。
description.en: This 1999 regulation specifies the standards and issuing authority for the official seals of state administrative organs like the Longchuan County People's Government.
